overview.en: Promotion Coin (PC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Promotion Coin has a current supply of 8,750,000,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of Promotion Coin is 0.00010891 USD and is down -18.73 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $78,508.09 traded over the last 24 hours.
